Package storesystem.api.deals

This package contains Deal objects. These objects are used to implement deals within the system and can be created and added. To add, use a ItemRegistry object to add a Deal object using addDeal(Deal).
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CartPredictate
    Represents a serializable predicate.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdditonalItemsDeal
    A class representing additional items to add and take out from stock TODO Note: the take out from stock feature has not been implemented yet
    Deal<T extends DealObject>
    The Deal class is the class that is capable of testing objects and returning if that deal can be applied or not.This is a base implementation but it still can be created.
    DealObject<T>
    Represents a Receivable object in Deal
    FreeItemOnPurchaseDeal  
    PriceReductionDeal
    This represents a reduction of price in any way shape or form.
    PriceReductionOnMutiSameItemDeal
    This represents a price reduction on a specific quantity of a item
    ReductionDealObject
    Represents a reduction in price
